doc.field: Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Series VIII. Photographs, August 28 - September 1, 1984 (at the Reed Foundation)
Series VIII. Photographs, August 28 - September 1, 1984 (at the Reed Foundation)

Approximately 1.0 linear feet (1 box, 1 binder). This series is comprised of 108 negatives, 3 contact sheets, 69 photographic prints, photocopies of 5 contact sheets, and one disc containing 180 image files in TIFF format. All images originate from black and white 35 mm film. The disc and the photographic prints are located in a separate binder labeled Notebook 14A. The contents of the disc are described in Subseries a., b., and c., and the photographic prints are described in Subseries d. Subseries a. contains digitized copies of the negatives in Folder 4; Subseries b. contains digitized copies of contact sheets in Folder 3; Subseries c. contains digitized copies of the photographic prints in Subseries d. Images in Subseries a., b., c., and d. have been arranged by conference session, and assigned consecutive ID numbers, e.g. "CC84-01." Digitized copies of photographic prints and corresponding original photographic prints have been assigned identical ID numbers.
